mapper.select: SELECT contentId,contentTypeId,mapx,mapy,overview,tel,address,title,zipcode,image,homepage,areacode,sigungucode, (6371*acos(cos(radians(#{mapy}))*cos(radians(mapY))*cos(radians(mapX) -radians(#{mapx}))+sin(radians(#{mapy}))*sin(radians(mapY)))) AS distance FROM place HAVING distance <= #{distance} ORDER BY distance

select.if: SELECT contentId,contentTypeId,mapx,mapy,overview,tel,address,title,zipcode,image,homepage,areacode,sigungucode FROM place WHERE areacode=#{areaCode} and sigunguCode=#{sigunguCode}
